original_title: サクラ大戦歌謡ショウ 五周年記念公演「海神別荘」
overview: The fifth Sakura Wars Summer Kayou Show - “Kaijin Bessou”  A stage musical based on the Sega/Red Company game series “Sakura Wars,” and starring the voice actresses from that franchise. It is split into two parts: act 1 is an adventure starring the members of the Flower Division, and act 2 is a play within a play Izumi Kyoka’s The Sea God’s Villa (Kaijin Bessou)
title: Sakura Wars Revue the 5th - Villas of the Sea God
